Many of my reviews rely on the overall experience to come to a final rating.  but I was sick when I went here and it was STILL exceptional.The design of the place was HOT!The cocktails were HOT!The food was HOT!The workers/uniforms were HOT!41 Degrees is kick butt and at the top of the worlds game right now.I hear that you must now have a reservation to get in.  When we went, it was first come, first serve.  That added a little extra adventure to the evening and when we walked out the front door there was quite a long line.Get there.
